info.description: A modern e-commerce API built with Go, Gin, and GORM
info.title: E-Commerce API

post.description: Authenticate user with email and password
Invalidate refresh token and logout user
Get a new access token using refresh token
Create a new user account with email and password

400.description: Invalid request data or user already exists

get.description: Retrieve current user's shopping cart with all items

post.description: Add a product to the user's shopping cart

400.description: Invalid request data or insufficient stock

put.description: Update the quantity of an item in the user's cart

400.description: Invalid request data or insufficient stock

delete.description: Remove an item from the user's shopping cart

post.description: Create a new product category (Admin only)

get.description: Retrieve paginated list of user's orders

post.description: Create an order from the current user's cart

400.description: Cart is empty or insufficient stock

get.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific order
Retrieve paginated list of active products
Retrieve detailed information about a specific product

post.description: Upload an image for a product (Admin only)

get.description: Get current authenticated user's profile information

put.description: Update current authenticated user's profile information

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
